title: ANTSJacobian
description: Calculate the Jacobian determinant of a transformation using ANTs. WARNING: ANTSJacobian may not be working correctly; see CreateJacobianDeterminantImage for an alternative method.

imagedim.title: Image Dimension
imagedim.description: The dimensionality of the input image.

outfile.title: Output File
outfile.description: The prefix for the output files.

uselog.title: Use Log
uselog.description: Whether to use logarithm in computation.

maskfn.title: Mask File
maskfn.description: Mask file used in the computation.

normbytotalbool.title: Normalize by Total
normbytotalbool.description: Normalize the Jacobian by the total in the mask. Use this to adjust for head size.

projectionvector.title: Projection Vector
projectionvector.description: Projects the warp along the specified direction. Do not add this option if no projection is desired.
